statements: UPDATE production_efficiency SET efficiency_rating = 4.75 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE ManufacturingProcess SET process_name = 'New Process Name', product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE process_id = 1;

UPDATE production_efficiency_analysis SET efficiency_score = 0.95 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE bottleneck_identification SET bottleneck_description = 'Resolved bottleneck issue' WHERE bottleneck_type = 'Machine Failure' AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
